attributes.action: Stop Payment Protection (PPI) retrieval companies from advertising.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to restrict PPI advertisement and prevent the badgering from companies to the public.
TV advertisements that start with such words as "This is an important announcement", when it actually is not appropriate.

We want to prevent TV, RADIO and TELEPHONE PPI advertisement from being a nuisance as repeat occurrences of all of the above happen on a daily basis.

This is a proposal of a restriction or reduction on tv and radio advertisements and a total restriction to cold calling of PPI advertisement.
